  • メソッド
org.sat4j.minisat.core

インタフェース RestartStrategy

  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    ConflictTimer, java.io.Serializable
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    ArminRestarts, FixedPeriodRestarts, Glucose21Restarts, LubyRestarts, MiniSATRestarts, NoRestarts

    public interface RestartStrategy
extends java.io.Serializable, ConflictTimer
    Abstraction allowing to choose various restarts strategies.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド abstractメソッド 非推奨のメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void init(SearchParams params, SolverStats stats)
      Hook method called just before the search starts.
      void newLearnedClause(Constr learned, int trailLevel)
      Callback method called when a new clause is learned by the solver, after conflict analysis.
      long nextRestartNumberOfConflict()
      非推奨です。 
      void onBackjumpToRootLevel()
      Called when the solver backjumps to the root level.
      void onRestart()
      Hook method called when a restart occurs (once the solver has backtracked to top decision level).
      boolean shouldRestart()
      Ask the strategy if the solver should restart.

      • インタフェースから継承されたメソッド org.sat4j.minisat.core.ConflictTimer

        newConflict, reset

    • メソッドの詳細

      • init

        void init(SearchParams params,
          SolverStats stats)
        Hook method called just before the search starts.
        パラメータ:
        params - the user's search parameters.
        stats - some statistics about the search (number of conflicts, restarts, etc).

      • nextRestartNumberOfConflict

        @Deprecated
long nextRestartNumberOfConflict()
        非推奨です。 
        Ask for the next restart in number of conflicts. Deprecated since 2.3.2
        戻り値:
        the delay in conflicts before the next restart.

      • shouldRestart

        boolean shouldRestart()
        Ask the strategy if the solver should restart.
        戻り値:
        true if the solver should restart, else false.

      • onRestart

        void onRestart()
        Hook method called when a restart occurs (once the solver has backtracked to top decision level).

      • onBackjumpToRootLevel

        void onBackjumpToRootLevel()
        Called when the solver backjumps to the root level.
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.3.2

      • newLearnedClause

        void newLearnedClause(Constr learned,
                      int trailLevel)
        Callback method called when a new clause is learned by the solver, after conflict analysis.
        パラメータ:
        learned - the new clause
        trailLevel - the number of literals assigned when the conflict occurred.
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.3.3
